description:
Care for animals you love so much in the biggest zoo you can imagine. Examine elephants with the stethoscope, help giraffes with sore throats or perform dental treatments on lions – all in a fabulous 3D view!

Look after super cute animals from all over the world: Lion, Tiger, Polar Bear, Chimpanzee, Elephant, Giraffe, Orang-Utan, Seal and Penguin

Use the interactive options of your Nintendo 3DS™: give medicine, palpate, take a listen with the stethoscope, care for wounds, rub with ointment, pull hurting teeth, take the temperature and much more

Get in your off-road vehicle and drive to your patients the shortest way

Take serious cases to specialized compounds for treatment, feeding, brushing and stroking

Don’t forget to anesthetize lion, tiger and polar bear carefully, before examining them

Learn all about the animals home regions

Expand the compounds with climbing trees, shelters, troughs and toys

Collect Nintendo Play Coins™ and exchange them for in-game currency
name: My Zoo Vet Practice 3D
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
